input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='Glitzhome 9' Pre-Lit Greenery Pine Cone Christmas Garland with Warm LED Lights (2-Pack'
  - Name='National Tree Company Carolina Pine Slim Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Snowy Camden Garland with Clear Lights'
  - Name='16 ft. Artificial Pine Christmas Garland with 75 Warm White LED Lights and 8 Lights Effects in Green'
  - Name='Balsam Hill 18' Outdoor Mixed Evergreen Garland with Pinecones Garland'
  - Name='Balsam Hill 6' Outdoor Meadow Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 108'' in. Lighted Faux Pine Garland'
  - Name='Northlight 6.5' Pre-Lit Pine and Berry Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company 9 ft. Pre-Lit Decorative Collection Garland with Clear Lights'
  - Name='Northlight 6' x 18" Pre-Lit Mixed Pine Artificial Christmas Icicle Garland'
  - Name='Nearly Natural Frosted Swiss Pine Artificial Garland with 50 Clear LED Lights and Berries'
  - Name='Northlight 6' Flocked Pine Artificial Christmas Garland with Iridescent Ornaments Unlit'
  - Name='Northlight Pre-Lit Battery Operated Holly and Berry Christmas Garland'
  - Name='60"L Sullivans Christmas Blue Green Red Link Garland'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 9-ft. Mixed Leaf Decorative Garland with Pinecones and Red Berries'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm Foxtail Pine Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 2-Ft. Heritage Pine Artificial Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 6.5' Pre-Lit Tree Stars and Pine Christmas Garland Warm White LED Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Snowy Sheffield Spruce Garland with Twinkly LED Lights'
  - Name='Noma Pre-Lit 9-ft LED Berry Flocked Christmas Garland with Battery operated Lights'
  - Name='Northlight Dakota Red Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Carolina Pine Slim Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different product type - a tree, not a garland; despite Carolina Pine name, the structure and use differ significantly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Snowy Camden Garland with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand garland with lights but 'snowy' effect and clear lights differ from warm pre-lit Carolina Pine garland; similar function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 16 ft. Artificial Pine Christmas Garland with 75 Warm White LED Lights and 8 Lights Effects in Green
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Longer garland with pre-lit warm white lights and pine material; comparable function but longer length and additional light effects.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill 18' Outdoor Mixed Evergreen Garland with Pinecones Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Longer outdoor garland with pinecones and mixed evergreen similar to pine but different brand and no pre-lit feature mentioned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill 6' Outdoor Meadow Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorter outdoor garland but 'Meadow' likely differs in branch type and no lit feature mentioned; less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 108'' in. Lighted Faux Pine Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Close in length (108 inches ~9 feet) and pre-lit similar pine garland though from a different brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 6.5' Pre-Lit Pine and Berry Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorter length garland with pine and berries, pre-lit but berry inclusion and length reduce relevance somewhat.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 9 ft. Pre-Lit Decorative Collection Garland with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and length, pre-lit garland but with clear lights instead of warm white; similar construction otherwise.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 6' x 18" Pre-Lit Mixed Pine Artificial Christmas Icicle Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different style - icicle garland versus traditional pine garland; shorter length and mixed pine but pre-lit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural Frosted Swiss Pine Artificial Garland with 50 Clear LED Lights and Berries
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar pine garland with pre-lit LED lights and frosted details; includes berries, which differs from reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 6' Flocked Pine Artificial Christmas Garland with Iridescent Ornaments Unlit
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorter flocked pine garland with ornamental decoration but unlit; less relevant due to lack of lighting and length.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Pre-Lit Battery Operated Holly and Berry Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit garland but uses holly and berries, not pine, changing core material and appearance significantly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 60"L Sullivans Christmas Blue Green Red Link Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Much shorter garland with color-specific decorative elements unrelated to pine branch garlands; low similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 9-ft. Mixed Leaf Decorative Garland with Pinecones and Red Berries
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar length garland with pinecones but mixed leaves and berries differ from pine; decorative but less similar material.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm Foxtail Pine Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Tree product, different structure and usage; despite pine type, significantly different than a garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 2-Ft. Heritage Pine Artificial Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very short pine artificial tree; differing product type and size compared to garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 6.5' Pre-Lit Tree Stars and Pine Christmas Garland Warm White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit pine garland with warm white lights and tree stars embellishment; slightly different decoration but similar base.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Snowy Sheffield Spruce Garland with Twinkly LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, similar size garland but with snowy spruce and twinkly LEDs differing from Carolina Pine and steady warm white lights.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Noma Pre-Lit 9-ft LED Berry Flocked Christmas Garland with Battery operated Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same length and pre-lit but includes berries and flocked finish, differing from classic pine and cone style of reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Dakota Red Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial red pine garland, similar core product but different pine variety and unclear lighting status.
